content: <?xml version='1.0' encoding='UTF-8'?>  <reference anchor='RFC0070'>  <front> <title>Note on Padding</title> <author initials='S.' surname='Crocker' fullname='S. Crocker'> <organization>University of California, Los Angeles (UCLA)</organization></author> <date year='1970' day='15' month='October' /> <abstract> <t>The padding on a message is a string of the form 10*.  For Hosts with word lengths 16, 32, 48, etc., bits long, this string is necessarily in the last word received from the Imp.</t></abstract></front>  <seriesInfo name='RFC' value='70' /> <format type='TXT' octets='12790' target='http://www.rfc-editor.org/rfc/rfc70.txt' /> </reference>
